Class DashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.views.controllers.scenes.DashboardController
public class DashboardController extends Object
The DashboardController class manages the main dashboard screen of the ticket sales system. It handles navigation to other screens, displays the list of events, and manages the user search functionality.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws IOException
      Initializes the dashboard screen, sets up button actions, and populates the list of available events.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while loading event data.

    • setStageController

      public void setStageController(StageController stageController)
      Sets the reference to the stage controller.
      Parameters:
      stageController - The StageController instance.

    • setScreensController

      public void setScreensController(ScreensController screensController)
      Sets the reference to the screen controller.
      Parameters:
      screensController - The ScreensController instance.

    • handleDashboardClick

      public void handleDashboardClick()
      Handles the click event for the dashboard button. Loads the event list screen into the stack pane.

    • handleProfileClick

      public void handleProfileClick()
      Handles the click event for the profile button. Loads the user profile screen into the stack pane.

    • handleEventsClick

      public void handleEventsClick()
      Handles the click event for the events button. Loads the event details screen for administrators and the event list for regular users.

    • handleTicketsClick

      public void handleTicketsClick()
      Handles the click event for the tickets button. Loads the tickets screen into the stack pane.

    • setParentAtStackPane

      public void setParentAtStackPane(javafx.scene.Parent parent)
      Replaces the current content of the stack pane with the given parent.
      Parameters:
      parent - The new content for the stack pane.

    • handleLogoutClick

      public void handleLogoutClick()
      Handles the click event for the logout button. Logs out the user and returns to the login screen.

    • handleSearchClick

      public void handleSearchClick()
      Handles the click event for the search button. Searches for events that match the search query and loads the event list screen.

    • encontredEvents

      public List<Event> encontredEvents()
      Returns the list of events found during the search.
      Returns:
      List of found events.
